function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Analysis of alteration of daily activities and habits","Impact":"Failure to understand the impact of altered activities on disease propagation","Mitigation":"Conducting a risk assessment of potential disease spread based on altered activities","Technologies":"Data analysis tools, epidemiological models","People":"Spanish population","Owner":"Research team"},{"Description":"Evaluation of the impact degree of confinement on public health","Impact":"Failure to assess the public health impact of confinement","Mitigation":"Implementing public health surveillance measures during confinement","Technologies":"Health monitoring technology, contact tracing apps","People":"Public health officials","Owner":"Health authorities"},{"Description":"Study of the incidence of home-dwelling relationship in different habitats and urban areas","Impact":"Limited understanding of disease spread in different living environments","Mitigation":"Conducting environmental risk assessments for disease spread in different habitats","Technologies":"Environmental sensors, geospatial mapping tools","People":"Residents in different habitats, urban planners","Owner":"Local government"}]}
